text: That movie was genuinely captivating; I couldn’t take my eyes off the screen.
The plot was a mess and the dialogue was cringe-worthy.

The soundtrack was grating and completely ruined the atmosphere.

Terrible camera work — everything looked cheap and poorly composed.

The characters were shallow and uninteresting; I couldn’t care less about them.
A surprisingly heartwarming story that left me smiling.

It tried to do too much and failed at all of it.

The cast feels disconnected; there’s no chemistry and it shows.
